thread.title: Viral video: Singapore woman finds maggots wriggling inside her burger!
thread.title_full: Viral video: Singapore woman finds maggots wriggling inside her burger!

author: FE Online
title: Viral video: Singapore woman finds maggots wriggling inside her burger!
text:
Viral video: Singapore woman finds maggots wriggling inside her burger! Viral video: Singapore woman finds maggots wriggling inside her burger! Who doesn't like burgers? All of us do, right? But what if we unwrap it and see maggots crawling inside! ww! By: FE Online | Published: February 23, 2017 6:05 PM This turned true for a woman in Singapore. Noor Nazera wanted to add some extra cheese to her kids burger and when she opened it, she saw maggots crawling inside! 
Who doesn’t like burgers? All of us do, right? But what if we unwrap it and see maggots crawling inside! ww! This turned true for a woman in Singapore. Noor Nazera wanted to add some extra cheese to her kids burger and when she opened it, she saw maggots crawling inside! Shocked to see live insects wriggling over the food, she decided to upload photos and a video of it online. Posting the video and pictures of the burger. 
Talking to Stomp, she said that her father-in-law had purchased four of the burgers, six curry puffs, one packet of nasi lemak and pickled food from a food stall at Hougang Central Bus Interchange. “I have submitted a complaint to the National Environment Agency (NEA) via their website,” Noor told Stomp, adding that it was the first time her family had purchased anything from the stall. 
Would you like to relish your burger without even having a look at the patty? Please Wait while comments are loading...
